import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { UserContext } from './UserContext' export default function Header(){ const {user }=useContext(UserContext); return(
Travelgram
AnyWhere
Any Week
Add Guests
{!!user &&(
{user.name}
) }
) }
